text:
Question 53) Mexico, Colombia, Peru and Chile decided to follow a shorter way to regional integration. The four countries, in mid -2012, created the Pacific Alliance and eliminated, in 2013, the customs rates of 90% of the total products sold between their borders.
OLIVEIRA, E. Covenant of the Pacific Strengthens and MERCOSULFICIOUS to its shadow. The agreement described in the text was economic objective for member countries
A) Promote the free circulation of workers.
B) foster competitiveness in the foreign market.
C) Restrict investments from multinational companies.
D) adopt currency measures to subsidize the agricultural sector.
E) Reduce customs films to encourage consumption.
